title: The bus line’s nearby at Ashland Pines! Great for commuters
posting_body: ['Ashland Pines', 'Featured Floorplan: 2-bed / 2-bath / 1051 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $1567', 'Deposit: Call', "Half off first month's rent!", 'Description: Professionally managed by Ventron Management, our 1 and 2 bedroom apartments offer exceptional features.', 'Residents enjoy wood burning stone fireplaces, full size washers and dryer connections, and spacious floor plans with bay windows that allow abundant natural light.', 'Lease Terms: 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Pet Policy: A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Apartment Amenities:', '● Balcony/Patio', '● Cable Ready', '● Carpeting', '● Ceiling Fans', '● Dishwasher', '● Kitchen', '● Storage Units', '● Stove', '● Tub/Shower', '● Views', '● Dining Room', '● Hardwood Floors', '● Linen Closet', '● Refrigerator/Freezer', '● Trash Compactor', '● Walk-In Closets', '● Washer/Dryer Hookup', '● Wood Burning Fireplace', 'Community Features:', '● BBQ/Picnic Area', '● Conference Room', '● Courtyard', '● Fitness Center', '● Grill', '● Maintenance/Manager on site', '● Multi Use Room', '● Public Transportation', '● Security System', '● Smoke Free', '● Cable/Satellite Available', '● Car Wash Area', '● Dog Park Pet Care', '● Online Services', '● Planned Community Activities', '● Sports Courts', '● Sundeck', '● Walking Distance to Shopping and Dining', '● Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '● Wireless Internet Available', 'Call us:', 'show contact info', '1247 Adcox Road', 'Stone Mountain, GA 30088', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'B042A665213A481A']
